subject: Science
title: Jupiter: King of the Planets
description: Learn Jupiter: King of the Planets in one minute.

hook.text: Jupiter is so massive that over 1,300 Earths could fit inside it.

buildup.text: Its gravity is powerful enough to capture 95 known moons â€” a mini solar system.

discovery.text: Deep inside, pressure is so extreme that hydrogen becomes a liquid metal.

twist.text: Jupiter's Great Red Spot is a storm bigger than Earth that has raged for centuries.

climax.text: Its gravity shields Earth by deflecting asteroids that might otherwise hit us.

punchline.text: Jupiter is Earth's bodyguard â€” a giant catching bullets for us.

quiz.question: How does Jupiter help protect Earth?
options: It deflects asteroids with its gravity
